name: Twisty Way: Another Ball Game
description:
Keep the ball on its way and try to go as far as you can in this slow-paced relaxing game with few special effects and noises. Touch the screen to change twist direction.

Enjoy this game's features:

  • simple mechanics
  • nice and calm music
  • few special effects
  • prev-gen graphics in full 3D

Try not smash your phone out of rage because you play this game badly. There must be other good reasons.
